response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity that could significantly enhance your business operations and streamline your processes. Given its value, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. However, I understand the importance of fair negotiation. Considering its worth to you and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $10,000 for this exceptional product. This price not only reflects its true value but also allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 10000}
